newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Rand Mines says possible offer withdrawn.
newsitem.headline: Rand Mines says possible offer withdrawn.

text.p: South Africa's Rand Mines Ltd said on Thursday that it was withdrawing its cautionary announcement about a possible offer for the firm.
"Shareholders are advised that this proposal has been withdrawn," the firm said in a statement.
On March 17 the firm issued an announcement saying it had received a proposal which could have included an offer for its ordinary shares.
A company spokesman said the mine had been a holding firm that had now unbundled its assets and so was being wound up.
"It was unbundled last year and there are no assets in the business," he said.
The statement said as a result of the possible offer being withdrawn the winding up of the company would continue.
"A further announcement relating to the winding up of Rand Mines will be published in due course," it said.
